About Me

I'm an AI Engineer specializing in Large Language Models and Reinforcement Learning, with over 5 years of experience across multiple industries. Currently, I work at Travelers Insurance Company, where I focus on building distributed AI systems.

As an AI professional and technologist, I actively participate in industry-leading conferences including NVIDIA GTC and AI hackathons. Previously, I founded NearMeNow, where I led a team of 7 engineers in developing real-time applications.
